short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage your friends by selecting and removing individuals or clearing all at once! 🧹

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Advantages of the Extension 🌟
Save Time ⏱️: Quickly manage your friends without manual effort.
Selectively Remove Friends ✂️: Choose specific friends to remove instead of mass unfriending.
User-Friendly Interface 🖱️: Simple and intuitive design for easy navigation.
Customizable Selection ✅: Select all friends or only the ones you wish to remove.
Unique Features 🌟: Enjoy exclusive functionality not found in similar tools.
How the Extension Works 🛠️
Download the Extension 📥

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Activate the Extension 🔧

Click the extension icon in your browser toolbar.
Navigate to Friends List Page 🧑‍🤝‍🧑

If you are not already on your friends list page, click the Go to Friends List Page button in the popup.
Add Checkboxes to Friends ✅

Click the Add Checkboxes to Friends button to enable selection.
Make Your Selection 🔍

You can select all friends or pick individuals by checking the boxes next to their names.
Remove Selected Friends ❌

After making your selection, click the Remove Selected Friends button to remove the chosen connections.
Enjoy efficient and hassle-free friend management with Friend Select & Remove! 😊

Note: This extension is an independent tool and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or authorized by any platform. It operates independently to provide its features.
